tool_description: Automatically generates relevant tags for knowledge base articles by analyzing content, identifying key concepts, and suggesting appropriate metadata tags for improved searchability.

article_content.description: Full text content of the article to analyze

article_title.description: Title of the article for context

max_tags.description: Maximum number of tags to generate (3-20)

tag_types.description: Preferred tag types: product, feature, issue, solution, department

existing_tags.description: Existing tags in the knowledge base to maintain consistency

error_messages: Empty content: Article content and title cannot be empty
Invalid max_tags: Must be an integer between 3 and 20
Invalid tag types: Must be from product, feature, issue, solution, department
Content too short: Article content must be at least 50 characters for meaningful tag generation
Existing tags limit exceeded: Maximum of 100 existing tags can be processed for consistency checking
usage: Provide article_content and article_title. Optionally set max_tags (3-20), specify tag_types array for focused tagging, and provide existing_tags array to ensure consistency with current tag vocabulary.

generated_tags.description: List of generated tags for the article

tag_relevance_scores.description: Relevance scores (0-1) corresponding to each generated tag

primary_keywords.description: Key phrases identified in the content
